category.description: ESD.2 : Minimum space between two ESD implant areas. (Merge if the space is less than 0.6um). : 0.6µm

category.name: ESD.3a
category.description: ESD.3a : Minimum space to NCOMP. : 0.6µm

category.name: ESD.3b
category.description: ESD.3b : Min/max space to a butted PCOMP.

category.name: ESD.4a
category.description: ESD.4a : Extension beyond NCOMP. : 0.24µm

category.name: ESD.4b
category.description: ESD.4b : Minimum overlap of an ESD implant edge to a COMP. : 0.45µm

category.name: ESD.5a
category.description: ESD.5a : Minimum ESD area (um2). : 0.49µm²

category.name: ESD.5b
category.description: ESD.5b : Minimum field area enclosed by ESD implant (um2). : 0.49µm²

category.name: ESD.6
category.description: ESD.6 : Extension perpendicular to Poly2 gate. : 0.45µm

category.name: ESD.7
category.description: ESD.7 : No ESD implant inside PCOMP.

category.name: ESD.8
category.description: ESD.8 : Minimum space to Nplus/Pplus. : 0.3µm

category.name: ESD.pl
category.description: ESD.pl : Minimum gate length of 5V/6V gate NMOS. : 0.8µm

category.name: ESD.9
category.description: ESD.9 : ESD implant layer must be overlapped by Dualgate layer (as ESD implant option is only for 5V/6V devices).

category.name: ESD.10
category.description: ESD.10 : LVS_IO shall be drawn covering I/O MOS active area by minimum overlap.

category.name: CO.1
category.description: CO.1 : Min/max contact size. : 0.22µm

category.name: CO.2a
category.description: CO.2a : min. contact spacing : 0.25µm

category.name: CO.2b
category.description: CO.2b : Space in 4x4 or larger contact array. : 0.28µm

category.name: CO.3
category.description: CO.3 : Poly2 overlap of contact. : 0.07µm

category.name: CO.4
category.description: CO.4 : COMP overlap of contact. : 0.07µm

category.name: CO.5a
category.description: CO.5a : Nplus overlap of contact on COMP (Only for contacts to butted Nplus and Pplus COMP areas). : 0.1µm

category.name: CO.5b
category.description: CO.5b : Pplus overlap of contact on COMP (Only for contacts to butted Nplus and Pplus COMP areas). : 0.1µm

category.name: CO.6
category.description: CO.6 : Metal1 overlap of contact.

category.name: CO.6a
category.description: CO.6a : (i) Metal1 (< 0.34um) end-of-line overlap. : 0.06µm

category.name: CO.6b
category.description: CO.6b : (ii) If Metal1 overlaps contact by < 0.04um on one side, adjacent metal1 edges overlap : 0.06µm

category.name: CO.7
category.description: CO.7 : Space from COMP contact to Poly2 on COMP. : 0.15µm

category.name: CO.8
category.description: CO.8 : Space from Poly2 contact to COMP. : 0.17µm

category.name: CO.9
category.description: CO.9 : Contact on NCOMP to PCOMP butting edge is forbidden (contact must not straddle butting edge).

category.name: CO.10
category.description: CO.10 : Contact on Poly2 gate over COMP is forbidden.

category.name: CO.11
category.description: CO.11 : Contact on field oxide is forbidden.
